meta.name: description
meta.value: The user asked what a setting value is.

parameter.name: setting
parameter.description: The setting that the user asked about.

parameter.name: deviceState

parameter.name: isGetBatteryForAirpods
parameter.description: Indicates whether user asked to read battery level of their airpods

parameter.name: isGetBatteryForGenericHeadphones
